bioconda.name: bioconductor-puma
bioconda.summary: Propagating Uncertainty in Microarray Analysis(including Affymetrix tranditional 3' arrays and exon arrays and Human Transcriptome Array 2.0)

biotools.summary: This package calculates gene expression from Affymetrix 3' arrays and provides methods to process exon arrays, producing gene and isoform expression for alternative splicing study. It also offers improvements in terms of scope and speed of execution over previously available uncertainty propagation methods. Included are summarisation, differential expression detection, clustering and PCA methods, together with useful plotting functions.

bioschemas.name: puma
bioschemas.summary: This package calculates gene expression from Affymetrix 3' arrays and provides methods to process exon arrays, producing gene and isoform expression for alternative splicing study. It also offers improvements in terms of scope and speed of execution over previously available uncertainty propagation methods. Included are summarisation, differential expression detection, clustering and PCA methods, together with useful plotting functions.
